subtitles.dialogue_text: Hold them there! You, get down on the floor!
What's the hold up? Hurry up and break down that door!
Mama, here she is! She was hiding!
That's it...that's the stone! Hurry, into the next room!
Finishing: ~~~~Yasuda Michiyo Photography: ~~~~Takahashi Hiroshi Editting: ~~~~Seyama Takeshi
Sound Director: ~~~~Shiba Shigeharu Sound Editting: ~~~~ Inoue Shuuji Sound Effects: ~~~~Satou Kazutoshi
Cast: ~~~~Hatsui Genei ~~~~Tokita Fujio ~~~~Terada Nou Tanaka Mayumi ~~~~Yokozawa Keiko
Original Work, Screenplay and Direction: Miyazaki Hayao
Original script translation by Sue Shambaugh
Additional editing and subtitles by RA Re-synced for the QiX release by Arundel
Reproduction of this script is permitted for NON-PROFIT purposes only!
This subtitled tape was made possible for fans by fans and is not for sale or rental.
Business may finally be picking up again.
What are you doing up there? What about dinner?
Boss, a girl from the sky...
I can't let go! You do it!
Don't keep the people down below waiting.
It's no use. The silver isn't concentrated anywhere.
Shouldn't we have dug to the east?
That place is just full of old pits.
We'll just have to do it over again, won't we?
Put out the boiler fire. No overtime tonight. Times are hard. We'll end up starving.
It's no use, Mama. We can't find anything in the dark.
You think we've searched thoroughly, eh?
There's not a trace. We'll start again when it gets light.
Well, how do you feel? Hey, wait! Wait, I said!
I'm Pazu. I live alone in this house.
When I'm done playing, I give them this.
I'm relieved. Anyway, you look human.
Until a little while ago, I was worried you were an angel or something.
Thanks for saving me. I'm Sheeta.
I was surprised by the way you fell out of the sky.
I see...Why do you suppose I was saved?
After all, I fell out of an airship.
Say - can I see that for a minute?
It's been in my family for generations.
A pretty stone, isn't it? Just a second.
Looks like it wasn't the stone after all.
Yes. My head hurts from Boss's fist.
Oh, yeah. The pot is boiling. Let's go in and eat.
You can wash up over there.
That's a photograph my father took from an airship.
Laputa is an island floating in the sky.
An island that floats in the sky?
Yeah. They say it's just a legend...but my father saw it!
Swift wrote about Laputa in 'Gulliver's Travels', but that was just a story.
Father drew this from his memory!
There's no one living there any more.
There's supposed to be a lot of treasure there.
Father died in Sagi, looking for it.
But, my father's not a liar.
One day I'll prove it! I'll discover Laputa.
They're the ones who attacked the airship.
Has a new girl come to these parts?
Baby Madge! She came to Boss's place yesterday.
A cute girl, with dark hair in braids?
They're pirates! They're after this girl.
Leave us alone. We're just a poor lot.
You'll be a good boy, won't you? Protect her.
In any case, we'll get her somehow.
Think you're man enough? Settle this with your fists.
They think they can fool me, do they? Follow them!
Give us a ride to the next city, and we'll go to the police.
Stupid sons of mine...hurry up and get in!
She snuck out the back door. Get moving.
Don't just sit there...push these things off the track!
It's them, Mama. What'll we do?
I'm not giving up just yet! Let's move!
Hey, please help out these kids. They're being chased by pirates.
See that? The power of the Levistone!
It WAS the stone after all! Amazing!
It's okay. This way we'll go to the bottom.
Excellent! I WILL get my hands on it!
It did that when you came floating down, Sheeta.
I hope nothing bad happens to your boss or the engineer.
It's okay. Miners are tough. Let's go.
Since long ago, the mountain's been riddled with mine shafts.
There's an apple and two candies for later.
Your bag is like magic. It has everything in it.
Gondoa? That's in the northern mountains, isn't it?
Yes. When my parents died, they left me the house and farm.
You were kidnapped by those men with dark glasses?
Who could it be...with such an army...
Both Dora and the 'dark glasses' want to get the stone...
I had no idea there was such a mysterious power in this stone.
It has been handed down through my family, since times long past.
Mother gave it to me when she died, telling me never to show it or give it to strangers.
Forgive me for getting you mixed up in my troubles, Pazu.
Don't worry. When you fell from the sky, my heart was pounding.
I knew it was the start of something wonderful.
Grandpa Pomu! It's okay. He's a very nice man.
This imp looks just like Pazu...
and a little girl imp, too, I see.
Grandpa, do you always stay underground?
Since last night, the stars have been making a mysterious commotion...
I hope they quiet down soon.
There are Levistone veins inside the rocks here.
This happens when Levistone touches the air. It fades and becomes just rock.
It's no wonder the stars are so restless!
There's a mysterious power in this stone.
Only the people of Laputa had the power to make such a thing.
That was when it floated in the sky over Dekkai Island.
There really was a Laputa! Sheeta, it exists, after all.
Grandpa, where do you think the island is now?
Sorry, but could you put away the stone? It's too much for me.
When the stones are noisy, Laputa is over the mines.
So, if we went up into the sky now, we could see Laputa!
I tell others about stones because that's how I make a living.
Listen, the good luck the stones bring people also seems to invite bad luck.
What's more. That stone was made by human hands. Remember that...
That stone has saved eeta twice already, hasn't it?
This is amazing! Laputa is real.
Let's go back to the ship, Mama.
Keep quiet. We'll stay here for now.
The island is floating, hidden behind the peaks of those clouds.
I'll do it! I swear I'll find Laputa!
There's something I still haven't told you...
There's an old, secret name in my family.
When I inherited this stone, I inherited that name as well...
Did they give you a lot of trouble?
She'll talk as soon as we lock her up!
That's a bad habit of the government.
Rush things and both the girl and the investment will suffer, your Excellency.
If we'd mobilized the troops in the first place, Dora wouldn't have surprised us.
Your Excellency, the coded messages were deciphered.
This is a job for my agents.
Your Excellency need only move the troops at the right time.
Muska! I am the commander of the Laputa investigation. Don't forget that!
Of course; and I take my orders directly from the government. Don't forget that.
Where's Pazu? I want to see Pazu!
Don't you like the latest fashions?
Don't worry about him. His head is harder than mine.
Come, there's something I want you to see.
It has terrible destructive power. It's a robot soldier.
If this fellow hadn't fallen out of the sky, nobody would have believed in Laputa.
This wasn't made anywhere on the Earth's surface.
It has power almost beyond imagining.
And its body...metallic? Ceramic? Our scientists still don't know.
Look at this. Don't be afraid. It's been inactive since we found it.
